title: I built a minimal gaming & dev PC with ZX-1 and RTX 3070

media:group.media:title: I built a minimal gaming & dev PC with ZX-1 and RTX 3070
media:group.media:description:
Hello. I'm Takuya Matsuyama from Japan, a solo developer making a Markdown note-taking app called Inkdrop.
In this video, I build a minimal PC for gaming and dev.
I hope you enjoy it!

▶ Download my product: Inkdrop - Markdown note-taking app 
https://www.inkdrop.app/?utm_source=devaslife&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=vlog&utm_content=a4CqHh233cM

▶ Ingredients
IQUNIX ZX-1 https://iqunix.store/products/itx-case-zx-1
MSI Z590I UNIFY https://amzn.to/38WaNoO
Intel Core i5-11600K https://amzn.to/3z3QrES
NZXT KRAKEN X53 https://amzn.to/3z7KiHv
Samsung SSD 980 NVMe M.2 https://amzn.to/2YC1Yyv
Corsair DDR4 PC4-25600 16GB x 2 https://amzn.to/3C1cCgH
LINKUP PCIe 4.0 X16 https://amzn.to/3hpFkjr
Corsair SF750 Platinum https://amzn.to/3z9acek

▶ My equipments
* Video editing: Final Cut Pro X
* Camera: Fujifilm X-T4
* Mic: Zoom H1n
* Slider: SliderONE v2

Follow me online here:
▶ Subscribe Newsletter http://eepurl.com/dNgJo6
▶ Twitter https://twitter.com/inkdrop_app
▶ Blog https://blog.inkdrop.info/
▶ Instagram https://instagram.com/craftzdog

Credits:

0:00 Intro
2:28 Motherboard - MSI Z590I UNIFY
3:00 CPU - Intel Core i5-11600K
3:34 Attach the CPU to the motherboard
4:19 CPU Water Cooler - NZXT KRAKEN X53
5:41 Attach the CPU cooler bracket to the motherboard
6:24 Storage - Samsung SSD 980 NVMe M.2
6:40 RAM - Corsair DDR4 PC4-25600 16GB x 2
7:04 Put the M.2 SSD to the motherboard
7:57 Install the RAMs to the motherboard
8:15 Riser Cable - LINKUP PCIe 4.0 X16 20cm
8:42 Prepare to install the motherboard into the case
9:33 Install the motherboard
10:23 Power supply - Corsair SF750 Platinum
11:49 Install the water cooling radiator
12:34 Install the water cooling pump
12:58 Install the power supply
14:09 Graphic board - MSI GeForce RTX 3070 Ventus 2X 8G OC LHR
15:38 Boot up the PC
